typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		UserId as integer,
		Name as string,
		Email as string,
		CategoryId as integer,
		Personality as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> User
source(output(
		OrderId as integer,
		OrderDate as timestamp,
		FirstName as string,
		LastName as string,
		Address as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		PostalCode as string,
		Country as string,
		Phone as string,
		SMSOptIn as boolean,
		SMSStatus as string,
		Email as string,
		ReceiptUrl as string,
		Total as decimal(18,2),
		PaymentTransactionId as string,
		HasBeenShipped as boolean
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> Orders
source(output(
		OrderDetailId as integer,
		OrderId as integer,
		Email as string,
		ProductId as integer,
		Quantity as integer,
		UnitPrice as decimal(18,2)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> OrderDetails
source(output(
		id as string,
		ItemId as integer,
		BuyCount as integer,
		ViewDetailsCount as integer,
		AddToCartCount as integer,
		VoteCount as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> ItemAggregate
source(output(
		ItemId as integer,
		VoteCount as integer,
		ProductName as string,
		ImdbId as integer,
		Description as string,
		ImagePath as string,
		ThumbnailPath as string,
		UnitPrice as decimal(18,2),
		CategoryId as integer,
		Category as string,
		Popularity as decimal(18,2),
		OriginalLanguage as string,
		ReleaseDate as date,
		VoteAverage as decimal(18,2)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> Item
source(output(
		id as string,
		event as string,
		userId as integer,
		itemId as integer,
		orderId as integer,
		contentId as integer,
		sessionId as string,
		created as timestamp,
		region as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> Event
source(output(
		CategoryId as integer,
		CategoryName as string,
		Description as string,
		Products as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> Category
source(output(
		CartItemId as string,
		CartId as string,
		ItemId as integer,
		Quantity as integer,
		DateCreated as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> CartItem
